subject: Re: [cc-community] Does BY-SA extend to a newspaper?
body:
Lawrence Lessig wrote:
> On Apr 15, 2007, at 9:07 AM, Benj. Mako Hill wrote:
>>AIUI, the FSF seems to have taken the position that it does.

> This has not been FSF's policy position.

For clarity -- LL are you contradicting BMH's opinion above? That is to
say, you claim either that

1) FSF has not taken a position on the copyleft of photos binding
documents they illustrate, or

2) they have taken the position that they do not bind

?

(And which of those two do you claim?)

I really have no idea, but I'd like to know.

Cheers,
Terry


*licensor - the person releasing a work under the license
 license author - the person who wrote the license

--
Terry Hancock (hancock@AnansiSpaceworks.com)
Anansi Spaceworks http://www.AnansiSpaceworks.com
